name: You Can't Solo A Dragon!
description:
Story

For a rogue, a quest with a party requirement is a total nightmare. But when it's being offered by wizards, one cannot refuse such a lucrative opportunity.

A reluctant but necessary party-up leads the trio in search for an unidentified magical object that crash-landed in the Barren Oasis. Will the three be able to work together to complete the quest or die trying?

Influence the story with your strategy during the turn-based combat against various monsters. Lina the Rogue can run in recklessly for the kill but this attracts all the monsters to her.  Isaac the Knight is built to take hits, Elyon the Dracologist can hold back the damage, but coordinating their actions requires trust and patience.

Features
  • 4000 words
  • Turn-based-combat gameplay
  • Two endings

Instructions

Download the zip file. Unzip it, then launch the game from the application inside the folder.

Please do not try to save or load during battles or you may experience unpredictable behaviour. The game will warn you when a battle will start so you can save before it starts. You can't save during a battle.

If you choose to skip the battle, the game will act as if you let Lina take too much damage so that she can no longer fight during that battle (and this does affect the story).

Are you going to run in and get yourself killed? That's up to you.
